languages.text: "...Рэндора и Ксиони из дома Эрэбис. В сопровождении наследников Маттиса, Лорны, Роно и Люми Эрэбис. Слава династии!"

traits.locale_text: "...Рэндора и Ксиони из дома Эрэбис. В сопровождении наследников Маттиса, Лорны, Роно и Люми Эрэбис. Слава династи!"

languages.text: "...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"
languages.original_text: "...Рэндора и Ксиони из дома Эрэбис. В сопровождении наследников Маттиса, Лорны, Роно и Люми Эрэбис. Слава династии!"

traits.locale_text: "...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis and their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"
"...His spouse, Xioni, and their four children, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Welcome."
"...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis and their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"
"...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"
"...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"
"...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"
"...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"

languages.text: «... Randor y Xioni de la casa Erebis, junto con sus herederos, Mattis, Lorna, Rono y Lumi Erebis. ¡Gloria a la dinastía!».
languages.original_text: "...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: «... Randor y Xioni de la casa Erebis, junto con sus herederos, Mattis, Lorna, Rono y Lumi Erebis. ¡Gloria a la dinastía!».

languages.text: 「…エレビス家のランドールとシオ二、そして彼らの相続人であるマティス、ローナ、ロノ、ルミ・エレビス。王朝に栄光あれ！」
languages.original_text: "...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: 「…エレビス家のランドールとシオ二、そして彼らの相続人であるマティス、ローナ、ロノ、ルミ・エレビス。王朝に栄光あれ！」

languages.text: “……伊雷比斯家族的兰德尔与肖妮，以及他们的继承人，马蒂斯、洛娜、罗诺、露米·伊雷比斯。荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”
languages.original_text: "...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: “……伊雷比斯家族的兰德尔与肖妮，以及他们的继承人，马蒂斯、洛娜、罗诺、露米·伊雷比斯。荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”

languages.text: "... Randor und Xioni aus dem Haus Erebis, zusammen mit ihren Erben Mattis, Lorna, Rono und Lumi Erebis. Gepriesen sei die Dynastie!"
languages.original_text: "...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "... Randor und Xioni aus dem Haus Erebis, zusammen mit ihren Erben Mattis, Lorna, Rono und Lumi Erebis. Gepriesen sei die Dynastie!"

languages.text: « ... Randor et Xioni de la maison Erebis, ainsi que leurs héritiers, Mattis, Lorna, Rono et Lumi Erebis. Gloire à la dynastie ! »
languages.original_text: "...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: « ... Randor et Xioni de la maison Erebis, ainsi que leurs héritiers, Mattis, Lorna, Rono et Lumi Erebis. Gloire à la dynastie ! »

languages.text: "Erebis Hanesi'nden Randor ve Xioni. Yanlarında da vârisleri Mattis, Lorna, Rono ve Lumi Erebis bulunuyor. Hanedanlık çok yaşa!"
languages.original_text: "...Randor and Xioni of House Erebis, along with their heirs, Mattis, Lorna, Rono, and Lumi Erebis. Glory to the dynasty!"
